ing: 1 tablespoon GOYAÂ® Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1 (15.5 ounce) can GOYAÂ® Chick Peas, rinsed and drained
1/3 cup toasted hazelnuts or pistachios, chopped
des: "This protein-rich side dish is loaded with flavor and quick to prepare! Nutritious GOYAÂ® Organic Quinoa is simmered beautifully with recaÃ­to and orange juice. Then, plump and nutty GOYAÂ® Chick Peas are stirred in, along with fresh mint, parsley and hazelnuts. Enjoy this delicious medley of fresh spring tastes!"
ins: Combine oil, Recaito, quinoa, orange juice, salt and 3/4 cup water to boil. Simmer covered over medium-low heat, until liquid is absorbed and quinoa is tender, 20 minutes. Stir in chick peas. Remove from heat and let stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Stir in mint, parsley and hazelnuts.
